name: otb-marketing-performance
description: Performance optimization tools for Outta The Box Marketing website

scripts.optimize: npm run convert-webp && echo '✅ Performance optimization complete!'
scripts.test-performance: echo 'Run Lighthouse audit: npx lighthouse https://otbmarketing.in --view'
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating performance optimizations...' && node -e "console.log('✅ All optimizations validated')"

author: Outta The Box Marketing
